alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Boundary and northeastern Bonner Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 246 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms near Meadow Creek moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bonners Ferry and Moyie Springs. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 500 and 522. U.S. Highway 2 in Idaho between mile markers 65 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
